          <title>
            <string language="en">Pattern of decaying atom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Muster des verfallenden Atoms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Configuration d'atome se délabrant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Teste padrão do átomo deteriorando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modello dell'atomo decadente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρότυπο του αποσυντιθειμένος ατόμου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Modelo del átomo que se decae</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the sequence of patterns of 100 randomly decaying atoms in the course of one half-life.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pattern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radioactive decay</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radioactive atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radioactivity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">random process</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Reihenfolge der Muster 
von 100 nach dem zufall verfallenden Atomen im Verlauf einer 
Halbwertzeit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'ordre des 
configurations de 100 atomes se délabrants aléatoirement au cours 
d'une demi vie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a seqüência dos testes 
padrões de 100 átomos aleatòria deteriorando no curso de um 
half-life.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la sequenza dei modelli
di 100 atomi a caso decadenti nel corso di un periodo radioattivo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την ακολουθία προτύπων 
100 τυχαία αποσυντιθειμένος ατόμων κατά τη διάρκεια μιας 
ημιζωής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la secuencia de los 
modelos de 100 átomos aleatoriamente que se decaen en el curso de un 
período.</string>
          </description>
